title: No train service between Choa Chu Kang & Keat Hong

title_translations.zh-Hans: Choa Chu Kang 和 Keat Hong 之间没有火车服务
title_translations.ms: Tiada perkhidmatan kereta api antara Choa Chu Kang & Keat Hong
title_translations.ta: Choa Chu Kang & Keat Hong இடையே ரயில் சேவை இல்லை

updates.text: [BPLRT] UPDATE: Train services at Bukit Panjang LRT have resumed. Free bus services and bus bridging services have ceased.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Train services at Bukit Panjang LRT have resumed. Free bus services and bus bridging services will cont to be in operation.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: No train service btwn #ChoaChuKang and #Senja in both dir. Free public & shuttle buses are now avail at all BPLRT stations
[BPLRT] UPDATE: No train service btwn #ChoaChuKang & #Senja in both dir. Free public & shuttle buses are now avail at all BPLRT stations
[BPLRT] UPDATE: No train service btwn #ChoaChuKang & #Senja in both dir. Free public & shuttle buses are now available at all BPLRT stations
[BPLRT] UPDATE: No train service btwn #Choa Chu Kang & #Keat Hong. Free public & shuttle buses are now available at all BPLRT stations.
[BPLRT]  No train service btwn #Choa Chu Kang & #Keat Hong. Free public & shuttle buses are now available at all BPLRT stations.
